mapper.select: select * from (select rownum rno, a.* from (select fm.MFO_MID mem_id, fp.PH_SYSFILE from FINAL_MFOLLOW fm left outer join FINAL_PHOTO fp on fm.MFO_MID = fp.PH_ID where fm.MFO_OID = #{value }) a) where rno between 1 and 12

select * from (select rownum rno, a.* from (select fm.MFO_MID mem_id, fp.PH_SYSFILE from FINAL_MFOLLOW fm left outer join FINAL_PHOTO fp on fm.MFO_MID = fp.PH_ID where fm.MFO_OID = #{mid }) a) where rno between #{rno}+1 and #{rno}+12
select * from FINAL_MEMBER fm left outer join FINAL_PHOTO fp on fm.MEM_ID = fp.PH_ID where MEM_ID = #{value }

select m.*, o.*, p.*, ca.* from FINAL_MEMBER m left outer join FINAL_ONAIR o on m.MEM_ID = o.AIR_MID left outer join FINAL_PHOTO p on p.PH_ID = m.MEM_ID left outer join FINAL_CATEGORY ca on CAT_GNAME = o.AIR_GNAME where mem_Id = #{value }
select count(1) from FINAL_MFOLLOW where MFO_MID = #{mid} and MFO_OID = #{oid}

select rownum rno, a.* from (select * from FINAL_ONAIR o left outer join FINAL_PHOTO p on o.AIR_MID = p.PH_ID where air_mId like '%${findStr}%' or air_subject like '%${findStr}%' or air_gname like '%${findStr}%') a where ROWNUM between 1 and 12
mapper.insert: insert into FINAL_MFOLLOW(MFO_SERIAL, MFO_DATE, MFO_MID, MFO_OID) values (SEQ_MFOLLOW.nextval, sysdate, #{mid}, #{sid})
mapper.delete: delete FINAL_MFOLLOW where MFO_MID = #{mid} and MFO_OID = #{sid}
mapper.select: select * from (select rownum rno, a.* from (select * from FINAL_ONAIR o left outer join FINAL_PHOTO p on o.AIR_MID = p.PH_ID where air_mId like '%${findStr}%' or air_subject like '%${findStr}%' or air_gname like '%${findStr}%') a) where rno between ${rno} + 1 and ${rno} + 12
SELECT * FROM FINAL_MFOLLOW fm JOIN FINAL_ONAIR fo ON fm.MFO_OID = fo.AIR_MID LEFT OUTER JOIN FINAL_PHOTO fp ON fo.AIR_MID = fp.PH_ID WHERE fm.MFO_MID = #{value} order by fo.AIR_MID
select * from FINAL_ONAIR where rownum between 1 and 10

select fd.don_serial, fd.don_mid, fd.don_oid, fd.don_price, fd.don_rdate, fd.don_content,fd.url,fd.type,fr.rul_data from final_donation fd, final_roulette fr where fd.don_mid = fr.rul_mid(+) and fd.DON_PUSH = 2 and DON_oid = #{value}
select m.mem_id, m.MEM_NAME, p.PH_SYSFILE from FINAL_MEMBER m left outer join FINAL_PHOTO p on m.MEM_ID = p.PH_ID where m.MEM_ID like '%${value }%'
select rownum rno, a.* from (select * from FINAL_CATEGORY where cat_gname like '%${findStr}%') a where rownum between 1 and 12
select count(AIR_GNAME) cnt from FINAL_ONAIR where air_gname = #{value} group by AIR_GNAME order by count(AIR_GNAME) desc
select rownum rno, a.* from (select * from FINAL_BEFORE where BEF_MID = #{value } order by BEF_SERIAL desc) a where ROWNUM between 1 and 3
select * from (select rownum rno, a.* from (select * from FINAL_BEFORE where BEF_MID = #{mId } order by BEF_SERIAL desc) a) where rno between ${rno}+1 and ${rno}+3
select * from FINAL_MEMBER fm left outer join FINAL_PHOTO fp on fm.MEM_ID = fp.PH_ID where MEM_ID = #{id} and MEM_PWD = #{pwd}
select count('mem_id') from FINAL_MEMBER where MEM_ID = #{value }
select * from (select trunc(sysdate) - trunc(SUB_RDATE) from FINAL_SUBSCRIPTION where SUB_MID = #{uid} and SUB_OID = #{sid} order by SUB_RDATE desc) where ROWNUM = 1
select MEM_MONEY from FINAL_MEMBER where MEM_ID = #{value}
insert into FINAL_SUBSCRIPTION(SUB_SERIAL, SUB_MID, SUB_OID, SUB_RDATE) values (SEQ_SUBSCRIPTION.nextval, #{uid}, #{sid}, sysdate)
mapper.update: update final_member set mem_money = mem_money - 10000 where mem_id = #{value}
mapper.insert: insert into FINAL_DONATION(DON_SERIAL, DON_MID, DON_OID, DON_PRICE, DON_RDATE, DON_PUSH, DON_CONTENT, URL, TYPE) VALUES (SEQ_DONATION.nextval, #{don_mId}, #{don_oId}, #{don_price}, sysdate, 0, #{don_content}, #{url}, #{type})
mapper.select: select count(mfo_oid) from final_mfollow where mfo_oid = #{value}
select RUL_DATA from FINAL_ROULETTE where RUL_MID = #{value}
mapper.update: update final_member set mem_money = mem_money - #{don_price} where mem_id = #{don_mId}
mapper.select: select count(distinct ul.MID) from FINAL_USERLIST ul where ul.ENTER_TIME >= (select max(AIR_STARTTIME) from FINAL_ONAIR where AIR_MID = #{value}) and ul.STATUS = 1
select count(distinct fu.MID) from FINAL_ONAIR fo join FINAL_USERLIST fu on fo.AIR_MID = fu.OID where AIR_MID = #{value} and fu.ENTER_TIME > AIR_STARTTIME
